name: Steel Vampire / 鋼鉄のヴァンパイア
description: Hear the shrieks of colliding metal! Behold the true form of steel! An explosive onslaught of shooting action!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Core i3 or more Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Sound Chip
